original_title: seven methods of killing kylie jenner
overview: seven methods of killing kylie jenner explores cultural appropriation, queerness, friendship and the ownership of black bodies online and IRL.  “Look it’s two two tweets that helped me vent my frustrations. It’s really not that deep…”  Holed up in her bedroom, Cleo’s aired twenty-two Whatsapps from Kara and has cut off contact with the rest of the world. It doesn’t mean she’s been silent though – she’s got a lot to say. On the internet, actions don’t always speak louder than words…
title: seven methods of killing kylie jenner
